title: How to Get a Yawstrich in My Singing Monsters: Pro Tips & Guide

steps.title: Obtain some parent monsters.
steps.content: Obtain some parent monsters. Yawstrich can be bred with two combinations: a Scups and a T-Rox on Air Island, or a Cataliszt and a Yawstrich on Mythical Island. If you don't already have a Yawstrich and are having trouble finding one elsewhere, find and obtain a Congle and a Woolabee. [1] X Research source Rare Yawstrich can be bred with the same combination, just during a Rare breeding window.

steps.title: Level the parents to level 4.
steps.content: Level the parents to level 4. Monsters must be at least level 4 to breed, so level up your Scups and T-Rox if they're not already at least level 4. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Upgrade your Breeding Structures, if you wish.
steps.content: Upgrade your Breeding Structures, if you wish. While not necessary, you can upgrade your Breeding Structures to reduce breeding times by 25%. You can upgrade your structure by spending 25 diamonds. You can also add Wishing Torches around your Breeding Structure to help increase the odds of a rare monster being bred. [3] X Research source Wishing Torches can be lit for 24 hours by paying 2 diamonds or be lit permanently by paying 100 diamonds.

steps.title: Breed the parent monsters.
steps.content: Breed the parent monsters. Once you're ready to breed your monsters, put them in the Breeding Structure. A Yawstrich egg is hot pink with orange spikes, similar to a Yawstrich. [4] X Research source Make sure to breed outside of a Rare monster availability window. If there is an event going on that allows Rare monsters to be bred, you could end up breeding a Rare Scups, Rare T-Rox, Rare Noggin, or Rare Toe Jammer with a combination of a Scups and a T-Rox. This will decrease your chances that the Scups and T-Rox will breed a Yawstrich. [5] X Research source However, if you're specifically looking for a Rare Yawstrich, make sure to breed during a Rare breeding availability window, or you won't be able to get a Rare Yawstrich.

steps.title: Wait for your Yawstrich to hatch.
steps.content: Wait for your Yawstrich to hatch. It will take 1 day and 4 hours to hatch, or 21 hours if you've upgraded your breeding structure.
